option.name: description
option.value: Initializes a new Gradle build. [incubating]

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the components produced by root project 'Tut1'. [incubating]

option.value: Displays the sub-projects of root project 'Tut1'.

option.value: Displays a help message.

option.value: Displays the properties of root project 'Tut1'.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'Tut1' (some of the displayed tasks may belong to subprojects).
